channel.title: 317 - Crash on PvP Combat
channel.description:
Hey guys. Whenever I try pvp combat on my server the clients crash. This is the exact error I get.
[b]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1344) at client.method146(client.java:11928) at client.method102(client.java:7791) at client.method9(client.java:8664) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4473) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
Is this just because PvP was never implemented into my source, and If so how would i go about adding it. Ask for any more needed information.

item.title: 317 - Crash on PvP Combat
item.dc:creator: @thegraycowl thegraycowl
item.description:
@thegraycowl wrote:

Hey guys. Whenever I try pvp combat on my server the clients crash. This is the exact error I get.

Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.method34(client.java:1344)
at client.method146(client.java:11928)
at client.method102(client.java:7791)
at client.method9(client.java:8664)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126)
at client.run(client.java:4473)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .

Is this just because PvP was never implemented into my source, and If so how would i go about adding it. Ask for any more needed information.
